Cheng Jaccard loss¶

sota_implementations.cheng_2017.loss.jaccard_loss_cheng2017(y_true, y_pred)[source]¶

Jaccard loss proposed by Cheng et al.

Parameters

  • y_true (Tensor) – Ground truth masks.

  • y_pred (tensor) – Predicted masks.

Returns

loss – Jaccard loss score.

Return type

tensor
